definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Crushing of granites; mining of coal, minerals embedded in siliceous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 花崗岩粉碎，採煤，硅酸鹽礦石內植入礦物。

sentences.english: Chemical features of these granites are consistent with silicate liquid immiscibility.
sentences.chinese: 它們的化學特徵可以用硅酸鹽液態不混熔來解釋。

sentences.english: Alkali-free aluminosilicate glass is a kind of special glass used in many fields.
sentences.chinese: 無鹼鋁硅酸鹽玻璃是一種應用範圍較廣的特種玻璃。

sentences.english: The radiation was filtered either by borosilicate glass or by quartz .
sentences.chinese: 輻射光源或用硼硅酸鹽玻璃或用石英過濾。

sentences.english: And what mechanism can get rid of the silicate core that has not been broken by the tides?
sentences.chinese: 硅酸鹽核心又是在何種機理作用下不被潮汐力摧毀？

sentences.english: The borosilicate glass was strengthened by using low temperature ion exchange method.
sentences.chinese: 採用低溫型離子交換法對硼硅酸鹽玻璃進行增強。

sentences.english: The rice husk is a ligneous hard layer of the cereal with high silicate content.
sentences.chinese: 稻殼灰是具有高硅酸鹽含量的穀類的一種木質的硬層。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on mineral weathering by silicate bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 研究了硅酸鹽細菌對礦物的風化作用。

sentences.english: The influence of different fineness to the film-forming properties of silicate coatings is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了不同細度的滑石粉對硅酸鹽塗料成膜性的影響。

sentences.english: Ilvaite is a rare mineral of calcium-iron-bearing silicate.
sentences.chinese: 黑柱石是一種少見的含鈣鐵硅酸鹽礦物。

sentences.english: Ordinary Silicate Rotary-kiln Producing Early-consolidation Cement.
sentences.chinese: 普通硅酸鹽，迴轉窯早強型水泥。

sentences.english: At last the silicates is melted.
Lithium silicate photosensitive glasses doped silver were fabricated by the method of high temperature melt in silica crucible .
sentences.chinese: 採用高溫熔融法制備了銀摻雜的鋰鋁硅酸鹽微晶玻璃。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a silicate scale clearing agent for a ternary combination flooding extraction well.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種三元複合驅採出井硅酸鹽垢清垢劑。

sentences.english: UHP Projector lamps are made of borosilicate glass and fused quartz.
sentences.chinese: UHP投影機燈泡由硼硅酸鹽玻璃和熔凝石英制成。

sentences.english: One of the simplest examples of phyllosilicates is clay minerals.
sentences.chinese: 驗證層狀硅酸鹽存在的一個最簡單證據就是粘土礦物。
